verses.name: Job 24:1
verses.text: Why, seeing times are not hidden from the Almighty, do they that know him not see his days?

verses.name: Job 24:2
verses.text: Some remove the landmarks; they violently take away flocks, and feed thereof.

verses.name: Job 24:3
verses.text: They drive away the ass of the fatherless, they take the widow’s ox for a pledge.

verses.name: Job 24:4
verses.text: They turn the needy out of the way: the poor of the earth hide themselves together.

verses.name: Job 24:5
verses.text: Behold, as wild asses in the desert, go they forth to their work; rising betimes for a prey: the wilderness yieldeth food for them and for their children.
